name: few-time-at-home-backend
description: Tools with React app, API Rest and Telegram bot for people that spends few time at home.

scripts.start: npx tsc && cpy keys.json build && cpy configuration.json build && node build/index.js
scripts.start:withvideo: npx tsc && cpy keys.json build && cpy configuration.json build && cpy video/finished.mp4 build && cpy video/start.mp4 build && node build/index.js
